== Perinjanam (CT) (627876) ==

Perinjanam (CT) is a town in the [[Kodungallur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 9.3 sq. km. and harbouring 5342 households with total population of 21012 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 55 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 250 km. Male population is 9666 and female population is 11346. Scheduled Caste population is 2714 and Scheduled Tribes population is 75. Census Location Code of the town is 627876<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 55 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 35 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 20 km.
